items.title: Itâ€™s officially SUPERBOWL WEEKEND | walt_cafe
items.content_html: Itâ€™s officially SUPERBOWL WEEKEND! Are you a Mahomes or Brady fan?!? Letâ€™s get heated in the comment sections about who will win this Sunday. One thing we can all agree on is that our English Muffin Breakfast Sammie is a winner every time. Weâ€™re now offering different flavors of our Housemade English Muffins: plain, whole wheat, cinnamon raisin, and gluten-free! . Today is also the last day to order our Super Bowl Package. Make this weekend an easy (but still memorable) one with this dinner package: - Buffalo Chicken Dip with Housemade Chicken nâ€™ Biscuit Crackers - 24 Carrot Hummus with Zaâ€™atar Crusted Pita Chips - Korean Chicken Wings with Gochujang BBQ glaze, Sesame Seeds, Kimchee Ranch - 8 Corner Pizza (cheese or pepperoni, XL version of our regular pizza) - 3 Dick Murphy Lite Crowlers . Email meg@waltandwhitmanbrewing.com to order! . WALT CAFE: â­ï¸Open until 12pm today â­ï¸ Online ordering, delivery and pickup available â­ï¸ Call us at 518-682-3602 . GAME ON ğŸˆğŸŸ #superbowlweekend #superbowl #mahomes #mahomesmagic #tombrady #tombradygoat #fridayvibes #foodiesofinstagram #englishmuffins #englishmuffinsandwich #saratogasprings #saratogaspringsny #saratogaracetrack

items.content_html: Picture this... you had a long week. Youâ€™re work schedule was packed with Zoom calls. You had to shovel your driveway only for it to snow again. items.title: BIG NEWS | walt_cafe
items.content_html: BIG NEWS! Walt and Whitman Brewing has been nominated by USA Today Readers Choice top new brewery for 2021! We are so appreciative to be a finalist alongside other breweries from all across the country. It is all thanks to our extraordinary community--our day 1 customers and familiar faces to new friends and walker-bys. We have each of you to thank. We are so excited to be representing Saratoga, our home and where so much of our inspiration comes from. Lets show up and show out, Saratoga style, please support by voting (link in bio). Also- you can vote EVERYDAY until March 16th!! Set your alarms daily to get that vote in. Lets show the country how supportive Saratoga is :)

items.title: WE GOT OPTIONS | walt_cafe
items.content_html: WE GOT OPTIONS. Dine in or to go. Order here or online. Grab a sandwich with sausage, bacon, or a vegetarian patty (ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥). Mix and match on English muffins (plain, whole-wheat, gluten-free, cinnamon-raisin). So many good choices you can make today! Choice @walt_cafe for a day best enjoyed â¤ï¸ğŸ¥°! CAFE HOURS: **dine in** Wednesday-Sunday: 8-2pm BREWERY HOURS **to go only** Thursday-Saturday: 4-8pm Sunday: 12-5pm

items.title: So - we will be closed for service this week | flatbread.social
items.content_html: So - we will be closed for service this week. We have too many people quarantined for potential exposure to run the restaurants smoothly. As a result, we are taking the week off. Here are some pictures of our staff that we are trying to keep safe and healthy. Hope to see you next week! #effcovid @henrysttaproom
